Translations.Text: What is the matter with you? How poorly do you judge
Would you not yet take heed
Or, do you have any clear authority
Then produce your document, if what you say is true
And they assume a relationship between Him and the jinn. And the jinn do certainly know that they will be brought up for judgment
Allah is far more glorious than how they describe Him
Except for those who devotedly worship Allah alone
So you indeed and what you worship
Are incapable of tempting anyone against Him
Save him who is destined to burn in the flaming Fire
And there is none of us (Angels) but has an assigned place
And we are indeed those ranged in ranks
And we do indeed certainly glorify Him
And they did indeed use to say
If only we had a scripture from the ancestors
We would have devotedly worshipped Allah alone
And so they now disbelieve in it (the Qur'aan), and so they will soon come to know
And Our word has certainly already gone forth to those of Our subjects sent as the Messengers
That they indeed are surely those who shall be helped
And, indeed, Ours will be the triumphant army
So turn away from them for a while
And observe them, they too will observe
Would they want Our punishment hastened
It will be a bad day for those who wait for the punishment, as it would descend in their yard
And turn away from them for a while
And observe, they too will observe
Your Lord, the Lord of Majesty, is far more glorified than how they describe Him
And peace on those sent as Messengers
And praise to Allah, the Lord of the worlds
